title: New dialogues of the dead in three parts / dedicated to Lusian in Elysium ; made English by J.D.
author: Fontenelle, M. de (Bernard Le Bovier), 1657-1757.
notes: "I. Dialogues of the ancient with the ancient, II. Dialogues of the ancient with the modern, III. Dialogues of the modern with the modern."
Translation ascribed to John Dryden, apparently without evidence--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
